io.micronaut.web.router

Interface Route

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ErrorRoute, MethodBasedRoute, ResourceRoute, StatusRoute, UriRoute

    public interface Route
    Represents a Route definition constructed by a RouteBuilder.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
    See Also:
    RouteBuilder, ResourceRoute

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<MediaType> DEFAULT_PRODUCES
      The default media type produced by routes.
